entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 02:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
